about_the_game:
Incredibly addictive, dynamic blocky cars that give you a lot of positive emotions! In Pixel Car Racer you have to take part in a breathtaking racer car game where you have to rush along a track full of secrets, obstacles, bonuses, jumps and finish first.

🏁 Action-filled Race Tracks

Explore challenging tracks, crash every voxel, become faster than opponents and conquer the title of Champion in pixel car racer!

💥 Unique Voxel Destruction

Voxel crash system that affects blocky cars performance and wrecks the car apart block by block to crash block car racer.

🎮 Spectacular Blocky Cars Action

The car race game has realistic physics, stylish 3D graphics, easy-to-use controls, entertaining gameplay and spectacular car crashes.

🚗 Unique Race Car - Collect All Of Them

Collect a garage full of karts, monster trucks, muscle cars, snowmobiles, buggies, formula supercars, micro cars and motorcycles - every car has a unique voxel set.

🔫 Powerup Your Pixel Car Racer

Discover Powerups to use weapons like missiles or shield boost for competitive advantage against other car racers during pixel games.

🚀 Upgrade Advantage

Upgrade race car stats to increase performance and voxel destruction prototype survivability to win pixel games.

Highlights:

  • Career mode with more than 60 tracks
  • Quick Race mode featuring every day challenges
  • 28 unique blocky cars with different voxel set, strengths and weaknesses
  • Dozens of unique power-ups, upgrades and weapons to use during the race!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
